summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to defense attorney Christian Everdell regarding a discovery production in the case US v. Maxwell. The email indicates a small discovery production is ready and asks for instructions on how to deliver it via an FTP site.

keyFacts: The document is a 2021 email from a federal prosecutor to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team regarding discovery production.
It shows ongoing legal proceedings and evidence exchange in the US v. Maxwell case post-indictment.
The correspondence is formal and logistical, focusing on the method of transferring discovery materials.
The email confirms the Southern District of New York as the prosecuting authority in the case.
